sentences.en: Assist board in assessing the independence of the external auditor.
sentences.cn: 协助董事会评估外部审计师的独立性.

sentences.en: Assume auditor expects a control procedure failure rate of 0.5 percent.
sentences.cn: 假定审计师预计控制程序的失败率是0.5%.

sentences.en: Before using financial statements analysts must review the auditor's opinions carefully.
sentences.cn: 在使用财务报表之前,财务报表分析者必须认真地阅读审计报告.

sentences.en: Ratification of the choice of the Auditor for the coming period.
sentences.cn: 批准下一周期的审计人选.

sentences.en: Solid of the person that teach teaches, auditor and listen.
sentences.cn: 教者固教之, 听者且听之.

sentences.en: The annual financial statements shall be certified by the Independent Auditor.
sentences.cn: 年度财务报表应经独立审计师认证.

sentences.en: The auditor examines the accounts of all county officers and departments.
sentences.cn: 审计员查对所有县官员及各部门的帐目.

sentences.en: The auditor has questioned the legality of the contracts.
sentences.cn: 审计员质疑这些合同是否合法。

sentences.en: The auditor needs to identify top management processes, and.
sentences.cn: 审核员应识别高层的相关过程.

sentences.en: The auditor was required to produce his working papers.
sentences.cn: 那个审计员被要求提供其工作底稿.

sentences.en: The auditor's independence is regarded as the disciple of a master soul.
sentences.cn: 审计独立性是注册会计师执业的灵魂.

sentences.en: The auditor's perfunctory inspection of the books overlooked many errors.
sentences.cn: 审计员的敷衍检查的书籍忽略了许多错误.

sentences.en: The very auditor and audit makes many of us feel uncomfortable.
sentences.cn: 一说起师和审计,我们中的许多人都会感到不安.

sentences.en: The very term auditor and audit makes many of us feel uncomfortable.
sentences.cn: 一说起审计师和审计,我们中的许多人都会感到不安.

sentences.en: Where practical, the auditor shall examine processes where they occur.
sentences.cn: 当可行时, 审核员必须审查现有的过程.

phrases.tran_cn: 独立审计师；独立审计员

trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to officially examine a company’s financial records
